state.dialogue:
Hello there!
It\'s so very nice to meet you!
Welcome to the world of Pokemon!

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue: My name is Rowan.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
However, everyone just calls me
the Pokemon Professor.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
Before I go any further, is this
your first adventure?

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
If you need advice, I\'m certainly
capable of giving it.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
This world is widely inhabited by
creatures known as Pokemon.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue: Here, I have a Poke Ball.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
Touch the button on the middle of
the Poke Ball, if you\'d please.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
We humans live alongside Pokemon
as friends.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
At times we play together,
and at other times we
work together.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
Some people use their Pokemon
to battle and develop
closer bonds with them.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue: What do I do?

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
I conduct research so that we may
learn more about Pokemon.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
Now, why don\'t you tell me>
a little bit about yourself?

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
Are you a boy?
Or are you a girl?

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue: All right, so you\'re a genderless?

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue: Tell me, what is your name?

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue: Your name is Nameless?

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
OK...
So, you\'re Nameless?

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue: A fine name that is!

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
Now, this boy here...
I believe he\'s your friend.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue: What might his name be?

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
Nobody, is it?
That\'s your friend\'s name?

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
All right, Nameless, the time
has come.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
Your very own tale of grand
adventure is about to unfold.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
On your journey, you will meet
countless Pokemon and people.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
I\'m sure that along the way you will
discovery many things, perhaps even
something about yourself.

state.speaker: Rowan
state.dialogue:
Now, go on, leap into the world of
Pokemon!

"Pokemon are by our side, always.
I hope you will understand the meaning
of those words."
That was the comment left by Prof. Rowan,
who has returned to Sinnoh from the
Kanto region.

state.speaker: (Television)
state.dialogue:
That concludes our special program,
"Let\'s ask Prof. Rowan!"

state.speaker: (Television)
state.dialogue:
Brought to you by Javascript, HTML, CSS, and this Website on
the Internet!

state.speaker: (Television)
state.dialogue:
See you next week, same TCP port,
same code!

state.dialogue:
You just got a preview of how the user interface will
function
